## Import csv files

Import csvs. 

```{r}
litters_data = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv",
  col_types = "ccddiiii")
litters_data = janitor::clean_names(litters_data)

pups_data = read_csv("./data/FAS_pups.csv",
  col_types = "ciiiii")
pups_data = janitor::clean_names(pups_data)
```
